page.title: 14 SHOPS IN AYNHO
page.content: {AYNHO STORES} in The Square is a general shop which sells food and everyday needs. It is also a Post Office and sells stamps etc. There is a {CLOCK SHOP} in The Square where 2 men repair antique clocks. They make most of the parts out of brass and steel themselves. Down in the boatyard, by the canal, there is a {CANAL SHOP} where you can buy ice creams, souvenirs and things you need on a canal boat trip A number of {MOBILE SHOPS} visit the village each week in motorvans. CALLOWS and HAYWARDS sell general groceries; FRANKLINS and MUMFORDS sell meat; there is a fish & chip van and a fishmongers. NEWSPAPERS are delivered daily to the village, from Deddington.
